import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './AllScenarios.css' const AllScenarios = () => { const [data,setdata]=useState((JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('data')))) console.log(data) const [second, setsecond]=useState('') const handledelete=(index)=> { data.splice(index,1) setdata([...data]) } return (

Scenario

Scenario Id Scenario Name Scenario Time Number of Vehicle Add Vehicle Edit Delete {data.map((data,i)=>( {data.name} {data.seconds} {data.seconds} {data.seconds}
))}
) } export default AllScenarios
